body_html: Yeah that was described here a while back, but as you mention, it's not ideal. For example if you run Jupyter it'll lead to a memory leak / crash (at least on the system I tried it with).
body_text: Yeah that was described here a while back, but as you mention, it's not ideal. For example if you run Jupyter it'll lead to a memory leak / crash (at least on the system I tried it with).
body: Yeah that was described [here](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/33655731/error-while-importing-tensorflow-in-python2-7-in-ubuntu-12-04-glibc-2-17-not-f) a while back, but as you mention, it's not ideal. For example if you run Jupyter it'll lead to a memory leak / crash (at least on the system I tried it with).
